DataElement.preferredName: Left Arm Middle Point Between Antecubital Fossa And Wrist Joint Circumference Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the circumference measurement of the left arm at the middle point between the antecubital fossa and the wrist joint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Left Arm Middle Point Between Antecubital Fossa And Wrist Joint Circumference Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the wrist and located on the left side of the body.:An intermediate part or section; an area that is approximately central within some larger region._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._The space or interval separating two things._A triangular space on the anterior side of the elbow joint. Three main veins of the arm, the brachial artery, the medial nerve and the tendon of the biceps pass through this space._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A joint between the distal end of the radius and the proximal row of carpal bones._The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the wrist and located on the left side of the body.

Concepts.definition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the wrist and located on the left side of the body.

Concepts.definition: An intermediate part or section; an area that is approximately central within some larger region.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
The space or interval separating two things.
A triangular space on the anterior side of the elbow joint. Three main veins of the arm, the brachial artery, the medial nerve and the tendon of the biceps pass through this space.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A joint between the distal end of the radius and the proximal row of carpal bones.
The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.:Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
